entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watrous
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watrous 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: E 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
